original_text: And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil, who are taken captive by him at his will.
korean_text: 그들로 깨어 마귀의 올무에서 벗어나 하나님께 사로잡힌 바 되어 그 뜻을 따르게 하실까 함이라

sentences.original_text: And that they may recover themselves
out of the snare of the devil
who are taken captive by him
